channel.title: Requa Isle
channel.description:
Requa Isle (BattleScape Isle remake)
Welcome to Requa Isle, yes we have copied battlescape isle but that is to make you happy, we used to enjoy playing battlescape isle since it was fun i hope you enjoy my server as much as battlescape isle
Pictures: http://i34.tinypic.com/2lsxze0.png http://i34.tinypic.com/se4pax.png http://i35.tinypic.com/2cllap.jpg and many many more.
We are currently looking for moderators people who we can trust,
please come and check out our server as we hope you will enjoying playing it with us, i recomend talking to the admins for help, or our forums what we havent made yet but we will.
Development team: Josh Matt Lewis
Administrators: Josh Matt Lewis
Moderators: None
If you would like to download our the server please go to this link : http://www.speedyshare.com/143636605.html
The forums are: www.requa-isle.isgreat.org
Thank you for reading, please comment since that would be appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2008, 04:06:07 pm[/size][hr]Cmon guys
